attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sally Taylor started presenting BBC 1's South Today programme 18 years ago; she has news credibility; she can deliver the saddest  story of calamity or chaos with gravitas; she has been awarded the MBE for services to regional broadcasting 
Recently she has been replaced by a virtual avatar with a gossamer intellect and a high maintenance visual appearance, (a bit like a female version of Max Headroom).

No explanation has been given for the disappearance of the BBC's best regional broadcaster.
We the undersigned are fed up with the "dumbing Down" of news in favour of style over substance.
We all live in the real world so we need real "news we can use" and not just wear temporarily until journalistic integrity comes back into fashion at the BBC.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
